price: እነዚያ ያመኑትና መልካሞችን የሠሩትማ ጌታቸው በእዝነቱ ውስጥ ያገባቸዋል፡፡ ይህ እርሱ ግልጽ የኾነ ማግኘት ነው፡፡
arabic: فَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ فَيُدۡخِلُهُمۡ رَبُّهُمۡ فِي رَحۡمَتِهِۦۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلۡفَوۡزُ ٱلۡمُبِينُ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fa-ammā alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti fayud'khiluhum rabbuhum fī raḥmatihi dhālika huwa al-fawzu al-mubīnu
